Release file list of the destination URL and then 'fess-server-9.x.y.zip'.

subsection.name: Installation
subsection.p: Unzip the zip file you downloaded. If the Windows environment expand the zip decompression tool, in.

blockquote.p: If you installed in the UNIX environment, in the bin added the performing rights to a script.
blockquote.source: $ unzip fess-server-9.x.y.zip $ cd fess-server-9.x.y $ chmod +x bin/*.sh # (Unix環境のみ)

subsection.p: Open the unzipped folder by double-clicking.
Open the bin folder by double-clicking.

subsection.name: Launch of the Fess
subsection.p: Double-click the startup.bat file in the bin folder, Fess up.

blockquote.p: Run the startup.sh for UNIX environments.

subsection.p: Will start the command prompt appears. In the last sentence "Server startup... ' is Setup complete appears.

section.name: Operation check
section.p: Management UI is / http://localhost:8080/fess/admin. Default Administrator account user name / password is admin/admin. Administrator account is managed by the application server. In the management UI of the Fess, authenticate with the application server in fess role determine as an administrator.

subsection.name: Stop Fess
subsection.p: stop the Fess, double-click shutdown.bat file in the bin folder.

blockquote.p: Run the shutdown.sh for UNIX environments.

subsection.name: Changing the administrator password
subsection.p: Administrator account is managed by the application server. Fess Server standard available Tomcat, as well as to the user changing the Tomcat. Modify the password for the admin account of the conf/tomcat-user.xml if you want to change.

subsection.name: SOLR server password change
subsection.p: To access the Solr into Fess server is password becomes necessary. Change the default passwords in production, etc.
How to change the password, you must first change the password attribute of the conf/tomcat-user.xml solradmin.

Modifies the following three files webapps/fess/WEB-INF/classes/solrlib.dicon, fess_suggest.dicon and solr/core1/conf/solrconfig.xml. Write what you specified in tomcat-user.xml to the following password.
modify the following areas of the solrlib.dicon.
subsection.source: <component class="org.apache.commons.httpclient.UsernamePasswordCredentials"> <arg>"solradmin"</arg> <!-- ユーザー名 --> <arg>"solradmin"</arg> <!-- パスワード --> </component>
subsection.p: fess_suggest.dicon is the following.
subsection.source: <component name="suggestCredentials" class="org.apache.http.auth.UsernamePasswordCredentials"> <arg>"solradmin"</arg> <!-- ユーザー名 --> <arg>"solradmin"</arg> <!-- パスワード --> </component>
subsection.p: SOLR/core1/conf/solrconfig.XML is the following.
subsection.source: <!-- SuggestTranslogUpdateHandler settings --> <suggest> <solrServer class="org.codelibs.solr.lib.server.SolrLibHttpSolrServer"> <arg>http://localhost:8080/solr/core1-suggest</arg> <credentials> <username>solradmin</username> <!-- ユーザー名 --> <password>solradmin</password> <!-- パスワード --> </credentials>
